issue.message: Using `getString` to get device identifiers is not recommended
Unnecessary; `SDK_INT` is always >= 30
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `LocalMediaScanner` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `SpatialAudio` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak

issue.errorLine1: <string name="discord_information">SonsPhere uses the KizzyRPC library to set your Discord account\'s status. This involves using the Discord Gateway connection, which may be considered a violation of Discord\'s TOS. However, there are no known cases of user accounts being suspended for this reason. Use at your own risk.\n\nSonsPhere will only extract your token, and everything else is stored locally.</string>
